entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule

[DQR.IFRS.0080.8754] ifrs-full:CashAndCashEquivalentsClassifiedAsPartOfDisposalGroupHeldForSale has a value of -4,600,000 which is less than zero. This element should not have a negative value.
The properties of this ifrs-full:CashAndCashEquivalentsClassifiedAsPartOfDisposalGroupHeldForSale fact are: Period :2021-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : GBP Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/213800G1C9KKVVDN1A60/2021-12-31/ESEF/GB/0/213800G1C9KKVVDN1A60-2021-12-31.zip/213800G1C9KKVVDN1A60-2021-12-31/reports/213800G1C9KKVVDN1A60-2021-12-31-T01.xhtml 19490

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 02 - Profit or loss but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests, ifrs-full:ShareOfProfitLossOfAssociatesAccountedForUsingEquityMethod, hammersonplc:ImpairmentOfInvestmentInJointVentures, hammersonplc:ImpairmentOfInvestmentInAssociates, ifrs-full:ProfitLossBeforeTax, ifrs-full:IncomeTaxExpenseContinuingOperations, ifrs-full:ProfitLossFromOperatingActivities, hammersonplc:OperatingProfitBeforeOtherNetLossesAndShareOfResultsOfJointVenturesAndAssociates, ifrs-full:ShareOfProfitLossOfJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethod, ifrs-full:Revenue All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -
